A Better Log4j SMTPAppender

log4j配置mail发送log,会有多少发多少,如下改动可以在指定时间内发送指定次数的log java代码 package com.sohu.rc.util; import org.apache.log4j.net.SMTPAppender; public class LimitedSMTPAppender extends SMTPAppender { private int limit = 10; // max at 10 mails ... private int cycleSeconds = 3600; // ... per hour public void setLimit(int limit) { this.limit = limit; } public void setCycleSeconds(int cycleSeconds) { this.cycleSeconds = cycleSeconds; }...

Kill Zombie Process

查找僵尸进程

ps aux |awk '{print $8 " " $2}' |grep -w Z

查找此进程信息和父进程pid

ps -ef |grep $pid

1.使用housemd统计方法耗时,中文说明

./housewd $jvm_pid

2.使用ss统计tcp信息,参照文章

ss -s

ss -t -a | grep ESTAB
